required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Clinical Study Trial of Phenlarmide in China
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled, Single-dose, Multiple-dose, Incremental Tolerance and Pharmacokinetics Study of Phenlarmide Tablets in Chinese Healthy Adult Volunteers

brief_summary.textblock:
1. To evaluate the tolerance and safety of FLA tablets in healthy volunteers.
2. To evaluate the pharmacokinetics of FLA tablets in healthy volunteers.
3. Provide basis for dosage setting for follow-up clinical research.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.time_frame: From 0 to 20 days after dosing
primary_outcome.description: maximum tolerated dose (MTD), dose limited toxicity (DLT)

primary_outcome.time_frame: From 0 to 168 hours after the first dose

arm_group.description: Oral administration was conducted on an empty stomach, and the drug or placebo was administered once a day on day 1 and 150mg each time from day 8 to day 17.
Oral administration was conducted on an empty stomach, and the drug or placebo was administered once a day on day 1 and 150mg each time from day 8 to day 17.
Oral administration was conducted on an empty stomach, and the drug or placebo was administered once a day on day 1 and 600mg each time from day 8 to day 17.
Oral administration was conducted on an empty stomach, and the drug or placebo was administered once a day on day 1 and 600mg each time from day 8 to day 17.
Oral administration was conducted on an empty stomach, and the drug or placebo was administered once a day on day 1 and 900mg each time from day 8 to day 17.
Oral administration was conducted on an empty stomach, and the drug or placebo was administered once a day on day 1 and 900mg each time from day 8 to day 17.

intervention.description: Oral administration was conducted on an empty stomach, and the drug was administered once a day on day 1 and once a day from day 8 to day 17.
Oral administration was conducted on an empty stomach, and the drug was administered once a day on day 1 and once a day from day 8 to day 17.
